main.name: Sumit Kajbaje
main.description: I design and program websites and web applications of all types.
main.bio: As a Web Developer, I have gained some experience and am constantly learning new things. I am currently learning and aspiring to become a Full-Stack Web Developer. In addition to Web Development, I also enjoy DBD (Discord Bot Development) and Drawing.

projects.title: Google Maps Clone
projects.description: With the easy-to-use APIs and plugins, this project will allow you to find your location, change the map style to Satellite, Streets & Navigation or Outdoors. Along with this, we will be able to search for any location (Area) and receive directions from your source to your destination point with the option to choose from Traffic, Driving, Walking, or Cycling.

projects.title: Speed Typing
projects.description: This simple project allows you to improve your typing speed by taking you under a timer's control. Enjoy hours of enjoyment while you improve your typing speed.

projects.title: MediCare
projects.description: The Web Portal I developed allows users to collect and manage a patient's data from one central location in order to predict the severity and likelihood of diseases based on our findings.
projects.tags: HTML, CSS, JS, Bootstrap, PHP, AJAX, MySQL

projects.title: Animato - An imaginary Food site.
projects.description: For responsiveness, it uses pure HTML and CSS as layouts and stylings without relying on external CSS libraries.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: Gained an understanding of APIs and Geolocation with JavaScript.

projects.title: The Perfect Cup
projects.description: As I learned Web Development, I created it using Backend Programming and integrated it with a database and e-mail service as I learned Web Development.
projects.tags: HTML, CSS, JS, Bootstrap, PHP, AJAX, MySQL

projects.title: Android Controlled Robotic Vehicle
projects.description: Through Bluetooth communications, interface buttons, and voice commands, the Android app enables users to control the robot from a long distance.
